lines.text: CONVERSATION UNUSED WHOOPS I FORGOT THIS WAS VALID EVIDENCE
Maybe... the <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum</c> spell wasn't wearing off...
...so the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> got out a chisel and tried to break him out of the magic!
Kid, it's not <c=#0000FF>Flesh to Stone.</c> Why would he try to physically break him out?
